Specimen Type: Whole blood, plasma, serum, urine, saliva/throat swab, tissue biopsy
Purpose: Qualitative detection of Cytomegalovirus DNA in patient specimens by PCR.
Container: EDTA tube (blood/plasma/serum), SST (serum), sterile container or swab transport tube (urine, saliva/throat swab, tissue)
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument, biosafety cabinet, microcentrifuge, spectrophotometer, pipettes
